title: Being a character/skin designer at riot must be really hard
body:
[](http://i.imgur.com/rp3ednt.jpg)
Especially when 1/2 of your team or senior leaders were probably stolen from blizzard. It must be really hard to come up with a concept as there are too many to steal from WoW.

http://i.imgur.com/6QEMDUZ.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/biZuczt.jpg

I miss when WoW players didnt know what the fuck a league of legends was, then they came over and ruined everything just as the Fire Nation has.
